Text.Page: The {@LinkCreature:25#3021#primal Lokians} are making the cultists here even more fanatical. We must eliminate them all!
Hey, you are definitely much better than I thought. You see, these fanatic's emblems are enchanted with mana. If we analyze it, we may be able to find out how they were mind-controlled. Good job!
I can't do anything without more emblems.
